title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-2.12 - Width-how measured
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-2.12 - Width-how measured

State Regulations

The width of a stairway shall be taken as the length of
the treads between stringers. The width of a doorway shall be taken as the
width of the door. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
45-2.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
